channel.title: [PI] How to add name above head
channel.description: I want there to be a name above my head when im walking around or stuff ingame like floating. Any help would be appreciated please

item.title: [PI] How to add name above head
item.dc:creator: @97_emerald 97 emerald
item.description:

Yes like that but i want it to be everyone always sees it cant toggle off and i can change color

item.title: [PI] How to add name above head
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

More descriptive, please?
Also, if what you are asking is what I am thinking, there is already an option in most PIâ€™s where you can do that. Go into the settings tab, and open up the bottom right option in that tab, and there is an option for names above heads.

Read full topic
